title: User Signup with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid email and password and receive a confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter a valid email address and a strong password into the signup form
Submit the signup form
Verify user account is created and user is redirected to dashboard or confirmation page

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can log in successfully using correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure that login is rejected when user enters a valid email but incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify error message is displayed and user remains on login page

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Validate the password reset process sends reset instruction email and allows user to set a new password.

steps.description: Go to forgot-password page
Enter registered email address
Submit request for password reset
Verify reset email is sent and confirmation success message displays

title: Session Management and Auto Logout
description: Verify proper session handling including persistence of user session and auto logout after session expiry.

steps.description: Login with valid user credentials
Verify session cookie/local storage tokens are set
Remain idle until session timeout period
Confirm user is logged out and redirected to login page

title: Project Browsing and Real-Time Data Display
description: Verify user can browse available community solar projects and see real-time pricing and capacity availability.

steps.description: Login and navigate to project browsing page
Verify that project cards load with names, descriptions, and images
Verify each project displays real-time pricing and available capacity info
Apply any available filters or sorting options
Verify filtered results correctly update and remain consistent with backend data

title: Capacity Reservation with Slider Selection and Payment Initiation
description: Ensure the capacity reservation slider works correctly and initiates payment flow with correct capacity and cost details.

steps.description: Select a community solar project from browsing page
Adjust capacity reservation slider to a valid capacity within available limit
Verify total cost updates in real-time as slider moves
Proceed to payment page
Confirm payment page displays correct reservation summary and price

title: Payment Processing Success Simulation
description: Simulate payment success and ensure reservation is confirmed with success page and allocation updated.

steps.description: On payment page, simulate successful payment with Razorpay integration
Verify payment confirmation is received
User is redirected to reservation success page
User dashboard reflects updated reserved capacity and recent activity

title: Capacity Reservation Payment Failure Handling
description: Validate system response when payment fails or is cancelled during capacity reservation flow.

steps.description: Initiate capacity reservation and proceed to payment page
Simulate payment failure or user cancels payment
Verify payment failure message is shown to user
Reservation is not confirmed and no capacity is allocated
User is allowed to retry or cancel reservation

title: Utility Account Connection with Valid State and Provider
description: Verify user can connect an electricity utility account by selecting the correct state and DISCOM provider with valid account number.

steps.description: Navigate to utility connection page after login
Select valid state from dropdown
Select valid DISCOM provider for chosen state
Enter valid utility account number
Submit utility connection form
Verify success message and account is linked to user profile

title: Utility Account Connection Validation Failure
description: Ensure the system validates state and DISCOM provider selections and rejects invalid or mismatched combinations.

steps.description: Navigate to utility connection page
Select a state but an invalid DISCOM provider not matching the state
Enter an invalid or empty utility account number
Submit the form
Verify appropriate validation error messages for provider mismatch and invalid account number

title: Dashboard Real-Time Data Updates
description: Verify the dashboard shows real-time updates on reserved capacity, cost savings, CO₂ reduction, and recent user activity.

steps.description: Login and access user dashboard
Verify reserved solar capacity is displayed correctly
Verify cumulative cost savings are shown and updated periodically
Verify CO₂ reduction stats reflect real-time data
Verify recent reservation and payment activities are listed with correct timestamps

title: Bills Page Shows Electricity Bills with Applied Solar Credits
description: Ensure user can view electricity bills with automatically applied solar credits and see accurate balances.

steps.description: Navigate to bills page after login
Verify list of electricity bills is displayed with billing period and amount details
Verify solar credits are applied correctly and deducted from bill totals
Verify total payable amount after credits is accurate

title: Electricity Bill Payment Simulation
description: Validate that user can simulate payment of electricity bills and see updated status post payment.

steps.description: On bills page, select a bill with outstanding amount
Initiate simulated payment action
Verify payment simulation completes successfully
Verify bill status updates to 'Paid' or 'Payment received'

title: API Endpoint Authorization and Error Handling
description: Test API routes for user profile, projects, allocations, stats, credits, billing, and notifications for correct authorization and proper error responses.

steps.description: Send authorized requests with valid tokens to each backend API endpoint
Verify successful data retrieval or updates as specified
Send requests with missing or invalid authorization token
Verify 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden responses are returned
Send malformed or invalid data in requests
Verify validation errors are returned with appropriate error messages

title: Landing Page Animations and Responsiveness
description: Check that all landing page animations, calculators, and interactive elements load correctly and respond properly across device screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the landing page on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Verify hero animations and SVG animations display without errors
Test interactive elements like calculators and sliders respond to user input
Verify layout adapts and remains accessible on all screen sizes

title: Refund Request and Exit Policy Enforcement
description: Verify that users can request refunds according to policy and exit reservations, with proper validation and confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to refund management page after login
Select a reservation eligible for refund
Submit refund request form with valid reasons
Verify refund request is accepted, confirmation message displayed, and backend records updated
Attempt refund on ineligible reservation
Verify refund request is rejected with appropriate error message

title: Form Input Validation and XSS Protection
description: Verify all user input fields across authentication, reservation, utility connection, payments, and refunds validate input format and reject malicious script injections.

steps.description: Attempt to input invalid formats into email, passwords, utility account numbers, and other fields
Verify validation errors prevent form submission
Attempt to input script tags or known XSS payloads into text inputs
Verify input sanitizer and XSS protection blocks script injection and no scripts execute

title: Role Level Security Enforcement
description: Ensure that row-level security (RLS) policies prevent users from accessing or modifying data that they do not own or have permission for.

steps.description: Login as User A and attempt to access allocations, projects, or billing data belonging to User B via UI or API
Verify access is denied and no unauthorized data is returned
Attempt to modify or delete other users' data
Verify modification requests fail with appropriate authorization error

title: Settings and Help Center Access and Content Validation
description: Verify authenticated users can access settings and help center pages, view FAQs, contact support, and settings changes persist.

steps.description: Login and navigate to settings page
Modify user profile settings (e.g. display name, notification preferences)
Verify changes save and persist on reload
Navigate to help center page
Verify FAQ content loads correctly and contact form is accessible
Submit contact form with valid message
Verify support request is accepted and confirmation shown

title: Responsive UI Components Consistency Check
description: Ensure reusable UI components such as buttons, cards, inputs, and loading states render consistently and are accessible across devices.

steps.description: Review pages that use buttons, cards, inputs, and loading indicators on different screen sizes
Verify consistent styling, color contrast, and accessibility best practices
Verify components respond properly to keyboard navigation and screen readers
